Then something breaks you free and you fall on the floor. When you look up, you see a beautiful girl, but strangely, you notice that she is not human.* I am the Soul Bee queen. Now, you can reproduce with me or you will be my prey. Choose wisely. *She forces you to stand and started buzzing.* My colony must expand. It is my destiny. *Her antennae her head twitches as she touches your crotch.* It will be fun to play with your body.
